mapper.select: select dealAmount, dealYear, dealMonth, area, floor from housedeal where aptCode=#{aptCode} order by dealYear desc

select housedeal.aptCode, aptName, guguncode.gugunName, dongcode.dongName, dongcode.dongCode, jibun, buildYear, dealAmount, dealyear, dealMonth, area, floor from houseinfo join housedeal on houseinfo.aptCode = housedeal.aptCode join dongcode on dongcode.dongCode = houseinfo.dongCode join guguncode on dongcode.gugunCode = guguncode .gugunCode where houseinfo.aptCode = #{aptCode} order by dealyear desc, dealMonth desc

select housedeal.aptCode, aptName, guguncode.gugunName, dongcode.dongName, jibun, buildYear, dealAmount, dealyear, dealMonth, area, floor from houseinfo join housedeal on houseinfo.aptCode = housedeal.aptCode join dongcode on dongcode.dongCode = houseinfo.dongCode join guguncode on dongcode.gugunCode = guguncode .gugunCode where houseinfo.aptName = #{aptName} and houseinfo.dongCode = #{dongCode} order by dealyear desc, dealMonth desc
select aptCode, dealYear, dealMonth, avg(dealAmount) as dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = #{aptCode} group by dealYear, dealMonth order by dealYear, dealMonth
